title: About
I2EDC
hero.subtitle: Fostering innovation and entrepreneurship through cutting-edge resources, mentorship, and a vibrant community of student innovators

mission.heading: Our Mission
paragraphs: At the Institute Innovation Entrepreneurship Development Cell (I2EDC), we're revolutionizing student innovation with state-of-the-art facilities and mentorship that empower students to transform ideas into reality.
Our mission is to provide accessible innovation resources, foster entrepreneurial thinking, and build a vibrant community where creativity meets execution.

pillars.title: Innovation
pillars.desc: Creating an ecosystem that nurtures groundbreaking ideas

pillars.title: Accessibility
pillars.desc: Making innovation resources available to every student

pillars.title: Community
pillars.desc: Building a collaborative network of student innovators

values.heading: Our Values
values.summary: These values guide our decisions, shape our culture, and drive us toward our vision of creating the next generation of innovators and entrepreneurs.

cards.title: Excellence
cards.desc: We pursue technical excellence in every project, from prototyping to execution.

cards.title: Innovation
cards.desc: We challenge conventions and pioneer new approaches to problem-solving.

cards.title: Collaboration
cards.desc: We believe great achievements are born from teamwork and shared vision.

cards.title: Integrity
cards.desc: We operate with transparency, honesty, and ethical principles.

milestones.event: I2EDC established with vision for student innovation hub
Launched Protospace with initial prototyping equipment
Expanded to include Tinkering Lab and Machine Services
Became premier innovation hub with 500+ active members

leadership.heading: Leadership Team
leadership.summary: Our leadership team brings together faculty expertise and student passion to create an environment where innovation thrives and entrepreneurial dreams take flight.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
members.bio: Professor of Innovation & Entrepreneurship with 10+ years experience in student mentorship.

members.name: Rajesh Kumar
members.bio: Final year Engineering student with multiple successful innovation projects.

members.name: Priya Sharma
members.bio: Expert in prototyping technologies and maker space management.

members.name: Amit Patel
members.bio: Manages I2EDC facilities and coordinates innovation workshops.
